edu.ycp.cs201.cards

Class KlondikeModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.ycp.cs201.cards.KlondikeModel

  • public class KlondikeModel
extends java.lang.Object
    Model class storing information about a Klondike game in progress. Consists of a number of Pile objects representing the various piles: main deck, waste, foundation, and tableau piles. Note that none of the game logic is implemented in this class: all logic is implemented in the KlondikeController class.

    • Constructor Detail

      • KlondikeModel

        public KlondikeModel()
        Constructor. Should create all of the required Pile objects, but it should not initialize them. All piles should start out as empty.
